Hi Eclipse people

Got a NPE when lauching a standard Java application.
Environment is Eclipse M4 Build id: 200212181304


Here is the launcher configuration:

<launchConfiguration type="org.eclipse.jdt.launching.localJavaApplication">

c copylib ACCTSET.bms"/>

value="perspective_default"/>

value="org.eclipse.jdt.debug.ui.javaSourceLocator"/>
</launchConfiguration>

I was unable to reproduce your error (using the latest integration build). 
Could you please re-open this bug if this is still a problem on M5 (coming out 
later this week, or the latest integration build).

Thanks.
Does not reproduce a NPE in M5. So closed.
